article_title: GUEST COLUMN: No doubt, healthcare most certainly a right
article_text:
By LINDA ROMMERDAHL | Special to the Daily News

Posted May. 8, 2016 at 1:00 AM

article_metadata.description:
Re: Patrick Meade, Guest Column, “Healthcare is most certainly a right.”
“ ‘Those who do not learn history are doomed to repeat it.’ The quote is most likely due to George Santayana, and in its original form it read, ‘Those who cannot remember the past are condemned to repeat it.’ The phrasing itself certainly is catchy.” http://bit.ly/1ygkER5
The Treaty of Paris, signed on Sept. 3, 1783, brought the American Revolutionary War to a conclusion; the
